name: UI Team Lead
description: Contribute to the development effort of each project by leading and working on the continuous improvement activities of design process & development.

name: UI Technical Lead
description: Lay the foundation for an amazing engineering team. Implement best practices and coding standard.

name: Web Development
description: Deeply involved in development life cycle activities like design, coding, testing and production release.

name: Scrum Master
description: Helps the team embrace Agile core values, adopt and apply Agile principles, and implement Agile practices.
